Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back ALL INCLUSIVE SAVE $3087 PER COUPLE View gallery / Back Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru Resort Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru Resort Maldives Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru Resort &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights • Transfers • All-Inclusive Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru Resort Tucked away in the crystal-clear waters of the South Ari Atoll, Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru offers the kind of island escape dreams are made of. Just a 25 minute scenic seaplane ride from Malé, this boutique five star resort blends barefoot luxury with small island charm. Surrounded by swaying palms, soft white sand, and a vibrant house reef full of marine life, it is a haven for both relaxation and adventure. Whether you are snorkelling with colourful fish, lounging in a beachfront villa, or waking up to sunrise views in an overwater bungalow, every moment feels special. Dining is an experience in itself with a choice of restaurants serving fresh seafood, international flavours, and sunset cocktails by the sea. There is also a serene lagoon spa, daily yoga sessions, and personalized excursions like dolphin watching or exploring nearby islands. Outrigger Maafushivaru offers more than just a holiday. It is a peaceful, luxurious retreat where every detail is designed to help you slow down, reconnect, and truly unwind in one of the most beautiful places on earth. View more View less 7 nights + flights, transfers, all meals & more from $ 8889 per person share twin ALL INCLUSIVE SAVE $3087 PER COUPLE Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 21 Nov 25 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Malaysia Airlines from Auckland to Male Return Seaplane transfers from Male Airport to Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru Resort 7 nights accomodation Daily breakfast at the Cuisine Gallery Lunch served at the Edgewater bar daily between 12.00noon - 15.00 hrs Dinner at any of the operational restaurants All Ice creams, Snacks and Drinks at Koffee ‘N Chill between 11.00–19.00hrs (excluding retail items) A selection of non-alcoholic drinks including soft drinks, canned juices, water, coffee & tea A selection of alcoholic beverages including a selection of beers, wines, liquors & cocktails served throughout the day from 12.00 noon daily All Bottled Wines /Sparkling wine and Champagne from the Resort Standard wine list Full use of the in‐room minibar (replenished once daily) One Complimentary Sunset Cruise per person per stay as per resort schedule, combined with other guests and weather permitting 20% discount on all Bottled Wines /Sparkling Wine and Champagne from the Sommeliers Choice wine list served by the bottle 20% discount for selected excursions: Snorkel Safari, Dolphin Trip and Sunset Fishing 15% discount in selected Water Sport Activities such as iAquas, Jet Board, Water Ski Ride & Lesson, Wakeboarding Ride & Lesson and Fun Rides 10% discount in Bubble Maker, PADI discover Scuba Diving Program and all offered PADI Courses Complimentary use of non‐motorized watersport equipment Room Types Departs From Auckland from Auckland Overwater Villa The Overwater Villas are luxury villas with modern comforts along with bespoke views of the lagoon. The spacious bedroom features a king-sized bed and daybed. Auckland 7 night package from $8889 per person share twin Extra nights from $851 per person Travel 12 May - 31 Aug 26 Auckland 7 night package from $10,919 per person share twin Extra nights from $1152 per person Travel 01 Mar - 10 Apr 26 Beach Villa with Private Pool The beach pool villas are fitted with king-sized beds, a modern signature silver glass crystal tiled bathroom, a twin vanity and separate indoor and outdoor showers in your private garden 7 night package from $10,499 per person share twin Extra nights from $1092 per person Travel 12 May - 31 Aug 26 7 night package from $13,129 per person share twin Extra nights from $1468 per person Travel 01 Mar - 10 Apr 26 If the advertised room types don't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 21 Nov 25 or until sold out. • Prices are correct as at 03 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, and accommodation restrictions apply • Package pricing is based on return Economy class airfares flying Malaysia Airlines from Auckland to Male via Kuala Lumpur. If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary. • Accommodation must be consecutive nights at hotel. • Advertised prices are per person, share twin. • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. Availability may be limited over peak periods. For full terms and conditions please ask your House of Travel consultant. Prices are based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted. Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
